first_translate: I didn’t realize we were surrounded!
but I told you not to come out here!!!
it never gets old seeing your spells, my lady...
all but one have been knocked unconscious.
this is our last man standing.

hangle: 부잣집 아가씨 한 명 납치해 달라는 의뢰를 받아서…
손가락 몇 개가 날아가면 배후를 말하겠어?
first_translate: if I cut off all your fingers, will you tell me who did it?

hangle: 저들이 어디 길드 인간인지만 알아낸 뒤에 적당히 처리해요.
first_translate: first find out which guild they belong to, then deal with them appropriately.

hangle: 이미 이쪽은 사망자가 나왔으니 봐줄 필요 없어요.
first_translate: there are already casualties on our side, so there’s no need for leniency.
showing mercy only leads to suffering, while weakness results in death.
so we can’t let any potential threats live.
now I’m going to go make a complaint about what happened today.
now I’m going to go make a complaint about what happened today.
isn’t house halyeon one of the four great noble families...

hangle: 용병들이 특히나 신세를 지는 가문 아닌가!
first_translate: ...that many mercenaries owe their lives to?
no need to stand on ceremony.

hangle: 실은 여기 길드 용병에게 재밌는 일을 당해서,
first_translate: to put it simply, something interesting happened involving your guild members,
which is why I came to complain.

hangle: 길드야 항상 중립이니까 시시콜콜하게 따질 생각은 없어.
first_translate: your guild always remains neutral, so I won’t nitpick over every little thing.
however, there is one thing I’d like to ask.
tell me the name of whoever requested this job.

hangle: 저희는… 의뢰인의 신원을 비밀로 하는 게 원칙이라…
first_translate: unfortunately, client confidentiality prevents us from disclosing such information...

hangle: 아무리 용병 길드라도 공작가를 적으로 돌리면 좋지 않을 텐데.
first_translate: even though you’re a mercenary guild, making enemies with a duchess’ family isn’t good for business.
are you willing to risk upsetting us by refusing to answer?

hangle: 의뢰인의 가문이 우리 가문보다 신분이 높은가?
first_translate: or does the person behind this hold higher status than my family?

hangle: 아무래도 입을 열면 곤란한 것 같네.
first_translate: seems like telling me would get you into trouble.
that’s fine. I’ll let it slide.

hangle: 대신, 당연히 다음부터는 이런 일이 있을 때 슬쩍 언질은 주겠지?
first_translate: in return, next time something like this happens, please give me advance notice.

hangle: 난 연약한 귀족 영애라 이런 일을 또 당하는 게 무섭거든.
first_translate: as a frail young noblewoman, I fear being kidnapped again.

hangle: 이 일은 공작님께 나쁘지 않게 말씀 드릴 테니 걱정 마시고요.
first_translate: don’t worry, I’ll speak well of you when reporting back to father.
then we shall take our leave.
be careful on your way home!
the client holds more power than house halyeon.
with that much info, I’ve got enough to work with.

hangle: 지금 헤일론 저택의 사람들을 통째로 책임지고 있는 건 나니까.
first_translate: right now, everyone working under house halyeon answers directly to me.
I thought slaying dragons had toughened her up,
but looks like I worried for nothing.
